nodes.text: Mupples were small furry creatures that were imprisoned at the new Umboo Lightstation when Mungo Baobab, C-3PO and R2-D2 rescued them. Some considered Mupples a delicacy.
The Mupples seem to resemble the Tribble species from the Star Trek original series episode "The Trouble with Tribbles".
Though its relation to the species is unclear, Mupple juice makes an appearance in the next episode, "The Roon Games".
